title: Oh, no! Riot has revealed our secret!
body:
http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/05/dev-state-of-skins/

> I want to assure you that when we meet as a team to make decisions on what skins to make, you are always in the room with us.

We tried to hide but they know!
THEY KNOW!

Fine I admit it. I am the one hiding in the plant in the right corner.

replies.body: That was _you_ in the plant? Huh. I was hiding in the cabinet. Do ya know who was in the chandelier?
That was me. Didn't think I was noticed.

Of course you were noticed, we all specialize in stealth and perception.  My question is who the person in the trash can was, I never got a good look at them through the ventilation system I was hiding in.

Oh, that was me. I wanted to be with my kind. But I saw someone under a stack of Draven* masks.
*(Not Draven Draaaaaaaaaven)

That was me, okay? No one can be mad at a man covered in draaaaaaaaaaven faces from head to toe. that was my backup plan in case they saw me.

The real question is who was hiding in between the couch cushions. that was a pretty good idea.

No idea, but I was the one standing in plain sight with a lampshade on my head. It's a miracle they haven't noticed me yet but they tend to overlook balance issues the size of cargo ships as well, sooo...

...

Rito's gonna need a {{summoner:1}} for that {{summoner:14}}
Ye, that was me. Wanted to go the sneaky way. Found a lot of coins there. Btw. who was hiding behind the curtains? I saw movement there.
That was most likely me, if it was the curtains next to the fountain. I was waiting for a good moment to ult in when Shen came up, but it seems my spirit sword might have given me away.
But thanks to the spirit sword, I think I managed to go unnoticed...I hope. I'll turn into a bird man if things go awry and you guys hide under my birds draining rito's life and feeding them to me.
Ha, joke's on you, I was **IN** the fountain
hah, jokes on you, i was under the fountain!(still am, someone send help ;-;)

The question here being, how did you get there in the first place?
wait...
how are you typing this?

Magic gone wrong, there's a tiny portal i managed to open big enough for my fingers to get through, a bigger portal would require more strength, the portal leads to my laptop, please, help, it hurts reaching across the keyboard like this.
I thought Sia was the one swinging in the chandelier.
I was just standing there, in place of the table.

{{champion:29}} Mains: Oh feck, oh sheez, oh flark, they're onto me I'm outta here.

(Uses {{item:3142}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:7}} to escape Rito's vision).

{{champion:28}} mains and {{champion:107}} Mains in the bush: Twitch don't leave us behind! Wait for us!

(All 3 of them leave Rito HQ)

How to you think we planted the idea for the leaked OS Twitch? Evelyn rework? Rengar rework?

We stealth mains basically run Rito at this point

I am still waiting for a Legendary Heartseeker Twitch skin 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Me too  brother. I main Twitch and he hasnt gotten away from his green particles or poison icons for the entirety of his existence. 

If OS Twitch is Legendary I will cry tears of joy.

Any twitch skin that gets made will be mine.

I swear if i find out victorious twitch happens i will commit 100% of my matches to ranked and Moo ({{champion:12}}) myself up the elo ladder.
{{champion:17}} *demonic cackling*

> [{quoted}](name=Jinx is SO HOT,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PqyxacEY,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-05-05T07:22:39.539+0000)
>
> {{champion:17}} *demonic cackling*

{{champion:12}} Uses both {{item:3068}} and his E and finds you in stealth.

Uses Q to knock you out of stealth.

You should be thankful i'm not telling yasuo this.

Frankly I'm amazed you all fit in one of our rooms. 

Remind me never to play hide and seek with you D:
I just had the room bugged. Figured it would be easier then finding a spot myself :p

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Calad,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PqyxacEY,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2017-05-05T23:14:49.896+0000)
>
> Frankly I'm amazed you all fit in one of our rooms. 
> 
> Remind me never to play hide and seek with you D:

Depends on the room, doesn't it?

I mean, most of us could fit in Noms or Nocturne, but the Demacian rooms wouldn't work.

to be frank the best is the human-eating one-winged demonrat of Madagascar, that i have dubbed Sanchez.
I have no idea where's hidden tho, he' s really good.

I was under the drywall and made a tunnel to the floorboards, every time the floor squeaked it was me.

I'll admit, I mostly hid in those places so I could annoy Rito with squeaking and making them wonder who passed gas.
Savage{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I'm the one under the chairs, deleting phone messages and stealing pens.
You can thank me for when ideas get lost and forgotten.
When in doubt blame it on the singed main.
all you guys areblowing my cover. I've been under the carpet for years. YEARS.

Where did you say you are hiding?!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
far, far away from you.
Awkward moments.
oooooooooh lord
just dont tell anyone i wrapped myself in clear plastic and im hiding infront of the window.
Are you telling me i don't have {{champion:17}}  passive?
I'm hiding in the chair that Riot Tryndamere sits on. Marc Merrill, would it kill you to wear some fucking pants once in a while?!
No wait, that's quoted as if they're telling us something we don't already know. Does this mean Riot kidnaps us and brings us to this secret horror room without us even knowing it!? D:
So that's who it was. I was the guy who buried himself in the dirt of the plants pot, and I thought something was on me.
This comments section is pure gold.
But i thought that my pre rework Yorick disguise was brilliant. damn guess it was not good enough
they saw you for a minute, did you remember to upgrade to new yorick? that one is still essentially invisible.

Sad thing is a lot of people actually do forget about me until i ambush them with my ult because a lot of people still think they can 1v1 Yorick when he has ult also they forget how fast he can split push with his ult.
I just sit down in a chair and pretend i work there,
Did they check the speakers yet?

I CONFESS. 

I WAS THE GUY HIDING IN THE TEEMO MUSHROOM STATUE.

**GASP**

I CONFESS!!!!

I was the dude hiding in the desk drawers. 

Also, who was the dude hiding in that secret compartment underneath the desk I was hidden in? I could just make out the trapdoor leading to it.
I stay behind the toaster and climb on the toast that charlie makes before every meeting, It's hard as fuck when he has butter on there
